description: This is a Vite + React + TS app

translator.title: Avatar Lore Translator
translator.description: Get help translating and understanding Avatar stories with our specialized GPT.
translator.details: This custom GPT is trained to help translate and explain Avatar lore in a natural and contemporary style.

translatorSection.title: Avatar Lore Translator
translatorSection.description: Get instant help translating and understanding Avatar stories with our specialized AI assistant. Our custom GPT is trained to help explain Avatar lore in a natural and contemporary style, making the rich world of Avatar more accessible to everyone.

auth.description: Sign in to contribute to the Avatar Hebrew translation project
auth.loginDescription: Use your preferred social account to get started

hero.title: Keyoshi Project
hero.subtitle: Open Source. Open Story. Bringing Avatar: The Last Airbender chronicles to Hebrew speakers.

about.title: Keyoshi Project
about.content: It is an open-source initiative dedicated to translating the Avatar: The Last Airbender chronicles into Hebrew. Our goal is to make these beloved stories accessible to Hebrew speakers everywhere, powered by community collaboration and a love for the Avatar universe.

feature1.title: Open Source
feature1.description: All translations and code are public and free to use.

feature2.title: Community Driven
feature2.description: Collaborate with fans and linguists worldwide.

feature3.title: Faithful Translations
feature3.description: Preserving the spirit and nuance of the original stories.

feature4.title: For Fans, By Fans
feature4.description: A project built by Avatar fans for the Hebrew-speaking community.

testimonial1.name: Jane Doe
testimonial1.quote: This project is a gift to the Avatar community! The Hebrew translations are top-notch.

testimonial2.name: John Smith
testimonial2.quote: Open source, open story. I love contributing to something meaningful.

testimonial3.name: Emily Chen
testimonial3.quote: Translating the Avatar chronicles to Hebrew is a dream come true!

callToAction.title: Ready to join the journey?
callToAction.subtitle: Join us and help bring the Avatar stories to more fans!

hero.title: Keyoshi Project: The Avatar Hebrew Initiative
hero.tagline: Uniting fans and translators to bring the Avatar universe to Hebrew speakers everywhere.

missionSection.mission: To make the world of Avatar accessible to Hebrew speakers through open-source translation, community passion, and creative collaboration.
missionSection.vision: A global, inclusive fan community where stories transcend language barriers and everyone can experience the magic of Avatar.

values.title: Inclusivity
values.description: We believe everyone deserves access to great stories, regardless of language.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: Fans, linguists, and creators working together for a common goal.

values.title: Passion
values.description: Fueled by love for the Avatar universe and the Hebrew language.

members.name: Avi Cohen
members.bio: Open-source enthusiast and lifelong Avatar fan.

members.name: Noa Levi
members.bio: Professional translator and lover of fantasy worlds.

members.name: David Azulay
members.bio: Connecting fans and building bridges across cultures.

highlights.title: Fan Art: Kyoshi
highlights.description: Stunning artwork by community member Lior.

highlights.title: Translation Marathon
highlights.description: A weekend event where fans translated 5 chapters together!

highlights.title: Avatar Quiz Night
highlights.description: Test your Avatar knowledge and win exclusive prizes.

milestones.title: Project Founded
milestones.description: A small group of fans launches the Keyoshi Project.

milestones.title: First Book Translated
milestones.description: The Rise of Kyoshi is fully translated and released in Hebrew.

milestones.title: Community Milestone
milestones.description: Over 1,000 fans join the Discord and contribute to translations.

joinUsBanner.message: Ready to join the journey? Become part of the Keyoshi Project community!

contactPage.title: Contact Us
contactPage.description: Get in touch with us for any inquiries about The Keyoshi Project

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible

chapter.notTranslated: This chapter has not been translated yet.
chapter.dropConfirmation: Are you sure you want to drop this translation? This cannot be undone.
